sections.heading: Attachment; order of discharge; appeal; original action unaffected
sections.text: The original action shall proceed to trial and judgment in every other respect as though no writ of error has been prosecuted.SourceG.S.1873, c. 57, § 2, p. 715;R.S.1913, § 7777;C.S.1922, § 8721;C.S.1929, § 20-1048;R.S.1943, § 25-104
